content.text: A man has been arrested after a woman was found dead with what are believed to be stab wounds early this morning . The grim find was made by gardai at a house in Greenfort Drive , Clondalkin , Dublin overnight . Gardai were called to the home at 12.30 am and found a woman in her 40s with serious injuries , which are believed to be stab wounds at this stage . She was pronounced dead at the scene and her body remains there this morning awaiting the State Pathologist . A man in his 50s has been arrested and he is being held at Lucan Garda Station . A Garda spokesperson said : " Gardaí have arrested a man in his 50s following a fatal assault at Greenfort Drive , Clondalkin , Dublin 22 at 12.30 am on 1st March 2019 . " At 12.30 am Gardaí were called to an incident at a house at Greenfort Drive , Clondalkin .
